Plot.
A United Nations Space Command (UNSC) cadet experiences a crisis of
conscience before facing the Covenant on the battlefield, and draws
inspiration from Master Chief while fighting for the future of mankind
in this sci-fi action opus based on the hit X-Box franchise. As the
latest crop of cadets trains to defend Earth from extraterrestrial
threats, new recruit Thomas Lasky questions the need to fight. Later,
after witnessing the ruthlessness of the Covenant firsthand, Lasky
realizes that he may have what it takes to follow in the footsteps
of the great Master Chief.
